item.title: Targeted Hyperthermia for Glioblastoma Using Multiple Magnetic Tweezer System
item.description: NOTE: Currently under preparation. In this publication my primary contributions were the simulations of the distributed alternating magnetic field using COMSOL Multiphysics resulting from a coil bed I designed iteratively to improve the control and strength of the magnetic field for therapy.
